meanings.definition: Not concerned with beauty or artistic value.
meanings.sent1: The plain and nonaesthetic building served its purpose well.
meanings.sent2: The room's nonaesthetic decor was a stark contrast to the elegant furniture.
meanings.sent3: Despite its nonaesthetic appearance, the sculpture was meant to represent chaos.
meanings.sent4: The nonaesthetic design of the website made it difficult to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The artist intentionally created a nonaesthetic piece to challenge traditional beauty standards.

meanings.sent1: The old, nonaesthetic painting hung crookedly on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The garden was overgrown and nonaesthetic, with weeds everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The nonaesthetic outfit she wore to the party was a fashion disaster.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had a nonaesthetic charm that intrigued urban explorers.
meanings.sent5: The nonaesthetic landscape was a reminder of the harsh realities of nature.
